DOC.detailed_description: Healthy , adult volunteer either sex patch his/her back AN2690 Solution 2.5 % , AN2690 Solution 5 % , AN2690 Solution 7.5 % , AN2690 Solution Vehicle Sodium Laurel Sulfate 0.5 % course 21 consecutive day . After 24 hour , patch remove site evaluate use five-point scale irritation .
